game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find the ancient city of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost city deep in the forest, filled with treasures and artifacts from a bygone era. The villagers are eager to find it, but the journey is treacherous.

task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather rumors about the lost city.

task.objective: Retrieve an ancient map from the ruins of Castle Stormwind
task.description: The castle lies in ruin, but its library may still hold valuable information about Eldarath's location.
